fields.name: Netflix
fields.about: Popular streaming platform with a vast library of movies and TV shows.

fields.name: Hulu
fields.about: Streaming service offering a variety of TV shows, movies, and original content.

fields.name: Amazon Prime Video
fields.about: Amazon's streaming service with a mix of movies, TV shows, and exclusive content.

fields.name: Disney+

fields.name: HBO Max
fields.about: Streaming service offering HBO's original series, movies, and additional content.
